adjectives.description: giantly (comparative more giantly, superlative most giantly)

entries.meaning: Characteristic to, resembling, or relating to a giant or giants; giantlike.
examples: Ten of the twelve sent to spie out the land, by speaking ill of the country, and the barrennesse thereof, and withall, magnifying the cities for their strength, and the giantly stature of the men therein; disheartened the people from marching any further towards it.

adverbs.description: giantly (comparative more giantly, superlative most giantly)

entries.meaning: In a giant or gigantic manner; gigantically; enormously; immensely.
